DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate effect folate-rich food regard improvement folate status compare folic acid supplement . A randomized , parallel intervention trial two active group ( folate-rich food folic acid supplement ) one control group ( apple juice - 0 µg/d folate ) execute 12 week .
DOC.detailed_description: Sixty-two woman reproductive age , apparently healthy , non-smokers , consume special diet ( vegetarian ) , pregnant , plan conception lactating . A randomized , control , parallel intervention trial two active group one blind control group carry 12 week ( March June , 2013 ) . The active food group ( n = 21 ) consume folate-rich food ( germinate can faba bean , cooky , orange juice , provide additional 250 μg/d folate ) ; active folic acid supplement group consume supplement ( n = 19 , provide 500 μg/d folic acid ) ; control group ( n = 22 ) receive apple juice contain folate folic acid ) addition freely choose diet . Fasted venous blood sample collect baseline , two month three month quantification folate plasma erythrocyte homocysteine plasma .
DOC.criteria: Normal biochemical range : Fasted plasma glucose Iron status ( haemoglobin , serum ferritin ) Liver status ( aspartate transaminase , alanine transaminase , γglutamyl transferase activity ) Lipid profile ( triglyceride , LDL , HDL ) Folate status ( plasma erythrocyte folate ) Plasma total homocysteine ( tHcy ) Vitamin B12 History acute chronic disease Use vitamin mineral supplement folic acid fortify food ( within past one month ) A body mass index ( BMI , kg/m2 ) > 18 < 30 Any medication interfere folate metabolism ( e.g. , antiepileptic drug , antibiotic , methotrexate , sulfasalazine , anticonvulsant ) , smoker , consume special diet ( vegetarian ) , pregnancy , plan conception lactation
